title: Wall Facing, ca. 1725
description:
Two vertical rectangles, twenty-three tiles high.  A) Nine tiles wide at top; seven tiles wide at bottom.  B) Ten and one-half tiles wide.  

Arabesque design of foliage.  A) with centered figure of Justice under a canopy.  B) with centered urn.

tombstone.epitaph:
Wall Facing, ca. 1725.
ca. 1725. tin-glazed earthenware, underglaze. Gift of William Randolph Hearst. 1926-43-6-b-190.
